text: 8.2-3 Mat 27.55-56, Mak 15.40-41, 16.9, Luk 23.49 Pen ñɨn anɨb ak, bin tap gak Jisas gek suŋ lak ogɨnap, kɨcheki walɨjpal sek mɨdel ne gek bin yɨbɨl lak ogɨnap, ayɨp ajelɨgɨpal. Bin anɨb okok yɨb kɨli nɨm ak, olap Maliya taun Makdala nɨb apal. Nop kɨcheki anep kugul ak yek, Jisas agek pɨlɨk amnɨlak.
